entry.title: The Future of Bitcoin Testnet
entry.summary: Calvin expresses support for resetting Testnet3 but suggests maintaining the current rules, highlighting the existing codebase's capability to reset difficulty levels. He argues against implementing new changes at this juncture, pointing out the absence of compelling reasons for such modifications beyond the convenience of timing with the testnet reset. Calvin underscores that introducing any changes would merely add to the complexity and burden for all involved without presenting clear benefits or justifications for the shift.
